display.name: Elys Network
display.description: Elys Network makes crypto simple with universal access to tokens from all ecosystems. Whether you're a novice or an experienced user, you can easily navigate the DeFi space through a complete set of features, all in one place. From spot trading and liquidity provision to leveraged LPs and derivatives trading, everything is available on one streamlined platform. Our Smart-Shielded Pools eliminate impermanent loss, while the ELYS token acts as a powerful reward generator, enhancing user benefits. You can use your preferred assets like Solana, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Cosmos while enjoying a feature-rich ecosystem. Elys Network offers a fresh, innovative approach to DeFi, bringing everything you need into one seamless experience.
